list_definition.definition: to form a mental picture of (something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I can imagine how you felt.

list_definition.definition: to see or hear etc (something which is not true or does not exist)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Children often imagine that there are frightening animals under their beds
I imagine (that) he will be late.
